resources.string: Chip Cards Will Require Users to Dip Rather Than Swipe
No, You Donâ€™t Need to Post a Facebook Copyright Status

The change from a swipe to a dip may be the only sign many consumers have an enormous behind-the-scenes shift in the payment industry, as banks and retailers tussel over who should be blamed for fraud...

In recent days, you might have seen facebook statuses imploring you to post legalish language and other information from copyright violations. Don't bother. It doesn't work, and similar versions of the hoax have been repeated for years...
